text: As fun as it is to look to our favorite models, actresses, and more for fashion inspiration, it’s not always the most feasible (read: affordable). But, today in good news to get you through your mid-week slump, we’ve found our new favorite summer hoops: 1) They cost less-than $100. 2) They've got a pretty good cosign from women like Kylie Jenner, Shay Mitchell, and Vanessa Hudgens.
